enchantment.grapple.aer_hook.desc: Allows grappling to a location without being hooked into a block. Must be used with Grapple enchantment.
enchantment.grapple.grapple.desc: Turns a fishing rod into a grappling hook, pulling you towards a hooked destination if hooked into a block.
gamerule.adrenalinePreventsCooldown.desc: If enabled, player's fishing rods will not be put on cooldown when grappling.
